mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatroom (chatroom_id, user_1_id, user_2_id, open_date) VALUES (#{chatroom_id}, #{user_1_id}, #{user_2_id}, #{open_date})
mapper.select: SELECT c.chatroom_id, c.user_1_id, c.user_2_id, c.open_date, DATE_FORMAT(last_chat_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as last_chat_time, last_chat, u.user_name as user_2_name FROM chatroom c, user u WHERE user_1_id = #{user_1_id} and c.user_2_id = u.user_id
